thread.title: 'Unmissable' Arizona Eatery Serves The 'Best Barbecue' In The State | 92.9 The Bull
thread.title_full: 'Unmissable' Arizona Eatery Serves The 'Best Barbecue' In The State | 92.9 The Bull

author: Sarah Tate
title: 'Unmissable' Arizona Eatery Serves The 'Best Barbecue' In The State | 92.9 The Bull
text:
Barbecue comes in many forms — ribs smoked for hours and slathered in sweet and smoky sauce, slow-cooked brisket covered in a flavorful dry rub, juicy pulled pork or shredded chicken perfect for crafting a delicious sandwich topped with slaw. Fortunately, there are plenty of incredible barbecue restaurants found all around the country that offer everyone the chance to dine on classic dishes.
According to a list compiled by LoveFood , the "best barbecue restaurant" in all of Arizona is Little Miss BBQ in Phoenix. This popular spot draws in a crowd looking to dine on some of the best barbecue dishes and sides around. Little Miss BBQ has two locations around Phoenix. Find your nearest one by visiting the restaurant's website .
Here's what the site had to say about the best "unmissable" barbecue in the state:
"Get ready to wait in line if you're heading to Little Miss BBQ. Customers know husband-and-wife team Scott and Bekke 's fatty brisket and meaty beef ribs are second to none — and they're prepared to arrive well before opening time just to get their order in. How do they make it taste so good? It's all down to great quality beef and simple seasoning, plus a blend of Arizona white oak, pecan, pistachio, and mesquite firewood." See the full list at lovefood.com to read up on more of the tastiest barbecue joints around the country. In the mood for something sweet? You can also check out our previous coverage of the Arizona eatery that serves the "best pancakes" in the state .
